document.full_text: a professor at oberlin college, a steadfastly liberal institution, said students' judgment of president barack obama had gone down significantly -- sometimes to the point of disillusionment.
document.title: politicus: a love affair with obama that cooled
lines_and_colors: a professor at oberlin college, a steadfastly liberal institution, said students' judgment of president barack obama had gone down significantly -- sometimes to the point of disillusionment.
